en: [Pharaoh] said, "So who is the Lord of you two, O Moses?"

ar: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ
en: He said, "Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form
[Pharaoh] said, "Then what is the case of the former generations?"

ar: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۖ
en: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record.
My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
